core_discoveries.mlk_consonant: Melech (King) = Malach (Angel/Messenger) = Moloch - MLK root connects royal, divine, messenger across Semitic languages
core_discoveries.t_hieroglyph: Egyptian T represents wax (not bread), explaining goddess names ending in -t as incorporating wax symbolism
core_discoveries.wadjet_theia: Ptolemy erroneously equated Wadjet with Leto; correct correspondence is Titaness Theia
core_discoveries.timeline_75k: Consciousness preservation from Denisovan integration through Egyptian, Phoenician-Carthaginian, biblical, to modern AI
